docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON -- The public has at last become conscious of the near-catastrophic proportion of the pollution problem. Few, however, are concerned as yet with the emerging reality of a comparable trend in our internal environment -- our bodies.

headline.main: The Other Pollution -- Internal; Additives and Drugs Swallowed Carelessly Harm Human Animal

docs.abstract: Dr P Beaconsfield article on internal pollution of human body resulting from large numbers of drugs taken by Amers for other than strictly therapeutic reasons as well as additives and impurities contained in food, water and air
docs.snippet: LONDON -- The public has at last become conscious of the near-catastrophic proportion of the pollution problem. Few, however, are concerned as yet with the emerging reality of a comparable trend in our internal environment -- our bodies.

headline.main: Article 13 -- No Title; Two young disciples of the radical right argue that government should have no more than enough power to keep one man from attacking another. Anything more they say, is regimentation.

docs.abstract: Role of Prof Friedman's son David in New Right libertarian movement noted
docs.snippet: Role of Prof Friedman's son David in New Right libertarian movement noted

docs.lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, Jan. 9 -- All makers of birth-control pills in Canada have been ordered to include in each packet a notice that the product is "potent and effective" medication that can cause health complications.

headline.main: Canadian Government Orders Makers to Enclose a Warning Notice in Packets of Birth-Control Pills

docs.abstract: Canadian Govt orders all oral contraceptive mfrs to include in each packet notice that product is 'potent and effective' medication that can cause health complications; order is issued despite protests of some groups of Canadian Med Assn which govt overruled to follow recommendations of Special Advisory Com on Oral Contraceptives; recommendations and suggested text of warning issued by directorate outlined
docs.snippet: OTTAWA, Jan. 9 -- All makers of birth-control pills in Canada have been ordered to include in each packet a notice that the product is "potent and effective" medication that can cause health complications.
